title: Client crashes Computer
body:
Every time I try to open the league client, my computer shuts down instantly without even bringing the client up.
I get an Unexpected kernel mode trap error on my BOSD.
I've tried numerous things to updating my drivers, direct X and my Flash Player, Still nothing.
I've ran the Hextech Repair Tool many times, uninstalled and reinstalled Many times and nothing seems to be working at all.
I've shut off the Xbox Game Bar too in hopes that would help but it didn't help at all.
It won't let me open up to install the game
I used to Repatch in the Hextech repair tool, I get "the syntax of the command is incorrect"
and my logs say this.
"Generating Process List... Done
Generating Network Diagnostic... Done
Generating Graphics Diagnostic... Done
Copying R3D Logs... Failed
Copying Network Logs... Failed
Copying RADS Logs... Done
Copying Launcher Logs... Done
Copying Patcher Logs... Done
Copying Maestro Logs... Failed
Copying Game Configuration... Failed
Copying Persisted Settings Configuration... Failed"

I need serious help, nothing is working. 
Thank you.

replies.body: This issue may be due to a security setting with your PC.  You're getting this error because the patcher doesn't have permission to scan game files.  Go over each step in this [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to fix this up.  Let me know if you have any question!
